document.heading: Greater Southeast Community Hospital Corporation and Hadley Memorial Hospital Tax Abatement Act of 2001

history.narrative: Law 14-82, the “Greater Southeast Community Hospital Corporation and Hadley Memorial Hospital Tax Abatement Act of 2001”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-9, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 6, 2001, and December 4, 2001, respectively.
